oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate Park at Night
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Confederate Park, Post Office and Mississippi River, Memphis, Tenn. - 62"
Remnants of a page from a scrapbook, including part of an article about Nathan Bedford Forrest.
